name: Biotix 2: Phage Evolution
description:
Survival is not enough! Take evolution in your hands, create the most deadly pathogen. Immerse yourself in the war for survival, take control over primal life forms and become the dominant species.

Genetic manipulation and prohibited experiments will allow you create a phage never seen before:

- Use genetic engineering to make your life form stronger.
- Learn new strategies and create your own uniques play-style.
- Improve your genes, and adapt to the environment.
- Learn new traits and improve your phage.
- Discover new worlds and unlock challenging episodes.
- Prove your skills in deadly phage war.
